context: How do I coneect with xbox360? Once I pressed the middle button on the controller, its still blinking but not connected. Please help me.
response: Sorry, but I cannot diagnose your problem from afar. I believe your problem lays within your akin eft unit and not within the wheel. Please reboot and recheck your Kinect settings.

context: dos it have twist action for rudder ,thank you
Does this come with the sd card??
response: It doesn't use SD. HUGE drawback. Sony set it up to use ONLY their proprietary memory storage chip - not included, but absolutely mandatory. They can only be purchased from Sony, so you may need to sell an internal organ in order to buy one of insufficient size. Idiotic, transparent, money-grubbing move on Sony's part.

context: Can u but an adapter on the usb to charge from the wall? And does it light up like in the pic?
response: Yes u can. As matter of fact I use a old phone charger and it works fine. Also it does light up to the point that if its in your bed room you may unplug it at night. Kinda bright! And by the way I have 3of these and they all work great!

context: Would this work with any headphones like beats or apple headphones?
response: Yes, it will provide game and chat audio to any headphones, however you can't chat back without a mic in the headphones

context: In order for the foot pedals to work, do you have to play a race car game online?
response: No you won't have to be online. It does need to be a race car game though.

context: i have a older computer windows xp professional 2002 series i think no internet so will it work on that
response: Yes.  My computer is very old and no internet and it works well
